channel.title: When I make a monster it has 0 out of 0 hitpoints! How do I fix this problem?
channel.description:
When I try to make a monster, I type in
::npc 1
But yet when I do the man I've created has 0 hp when I put on the "show hitpoints above head" and attack it it says 0/0 I've tried it with other monsters. Sorry if this is really really easy this is only my first day with it.

item.title: When I make a monster it has 0 out of 0 hitpoints! How do I fix this problem?
item.dc:creator: @keyhan3 keyhan3
item.description:
@keyhan3 wrote:

:eek: Lol where do I type that in? I’m really sorry have not taken any classes about this stuff yet. I’ve just tried typing that in the run place under aryan it didn’t work do i have to type in excalty that ohhh please help me!!

Lol i’m a total idiot

Read full topic
